root.name: Awesome Golf
root.description: Gameplay Awesome Golf offered several golf courses, and players could choose to play 9 or 18 holes on each. Â While the game allowed shots to be taken from a traditional viewpoint behind the player, the primary view of the game was top-down and all movement of the ball was seen from this position. Multiplayer was available for up to 4 players, which required multiple copies of the game and use of the ComLynx cable.
